pkgmetadata.longdescription: Geographic Networks // Provides classes and methods for handling networks or graphs whose nodes are geographical (i.e. locations in the globe). The functionality includes the creation of objects of class geonetwork as a graph with node coordinates, the computation of network measures, the support of spatial operations (projection to different Coordinate Reference Systems, handling of bounding boxes, etc.) and the plotting of the geonetwork object combined with supplementary cartography for spatial representation.
